pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.utils

Class LocalImageCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • pt.ua.dicoogle.server.web.utils.LocalImageCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable, ImageRetriever

    public class LocalImageCache
extends Thread
implements ImageRetriever
    Handles the caching of PNG images generated by the Image Servlet. The cached images are kept inside a temporary directory created inside the user (or system) temporary directory. These are maintained for a maximum period of time if they are not used, and deleted on a regular basis to save disk space while not hurting the cache performance.
    Author:
    Ant√≥nio Novo

    • Constructor Detail

      • LocalImageCache

        public LocalImageCache(String name,
                       int interval,
                       int maxAge,
                       ImageRetriever under)
        Creates a local image cache that pools its cache directory at interval rates and deletes files older than maxAge.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the cache directory.
        interval - the number of seconds to wait between pool cache directory pooling.
        maxAge - the number of seconds that a file can stay in the cache without being used/read.
        under - the underlying image retriever
